fields.name: updatedDate
fields.label: Last Updated
fields.description: Set when content is significantly updated

fields.name: author
fields.label: Author
fields.description: Team member slug who wrote this article

fields.name: reviewer
fields.label: Reviewer
fields.description: Team member slug who reviewed/fact-checked this article (for E-E-A-T)

fields.name: credentials
fields.label: Credentials
fields.description: Certifications, degrees, awards (e.g., "20+ years in organic agriculture")

fields.name: expertiseAreas
fields.label: Expertise Areas
fields.description: Topics this person is qualified to write about

fields.name: isAuthor
fields.label: Can Author Posts
fields.description: This person can be selected as a blog author

fields.name: isReviewer
fields.label: Can Review Posts
fields.description: This person can be selected as a content reviewer

fields.name: body
fields.label: Extended Bio
fields.description: Full bio content for individual page

description.value: References another document, used as a foreign key
